ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: The purpose of this course is to deepen an understanding of the fundamentals of physical chemistry. You may not see many brand new topics but you will think about things in a deeper way and ultimately learn more than the typical amount. If you participate, you will get more out of class. If you take the risk of sounding like an idiot, you will be respected not scowled at!
I would say this class is very enjoyable and helpful for experimental p-chem students and would recommend it.
A truly interesting and fun course. It is nice to be taught material that will directly apply to my research.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: Answered above in every other question.
This course, while cementing the core aspects of p-chem, also discussed to greater detail a lot of important topics that are relevant to my research.
I will definitely use all of the knowledge gained this semester in my future research. The FCF stuff was especially helpful!
